model

Class SudokuBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.SudokuBoard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RandomGenerator

    public class SudokuBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Sudoku board as a two-dimensional int array. It provides methods to load a Sudoku from a CSV file, write a Sudoku to a CSV file, and check the correctness of an initial grid.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Arthur Thouzeau

      Check that numbers between 1 and the size of the SudokuBoard (inclusive) appear only once on each box.

      Check that numbers between 1 and the size of the SudokuBoard (inclusive) appear only once on each column.

      Check that each Sudoku cell's value is between 0 and the size of the SudokuBoard (inclusive).

      • set

        public void set(int value,
       int row,
       int col)
        Sets the value of a SudokuBoard's cell.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to insert
        row - the cell's row
        col - the column's row

      • get

        public int get(int row,
      int col)
        Returns the value of a SudokuBoard's cell.
        Parameters:
        row - the cell's row
        col - the column's row
        Returns:
        the value of the cell

      • checkInitialRange

        private boolean checkInitialRange()
        Check that each Sudoku cell's value is between 0 and the size of the SudokuBoard (inclusive).
        Returns:
        true if all cells are in the correct range; false otherwise

      • checkInitialRows

        private boolean checkInitialRows()
        Check that numbers between 1 and the size of the SudokuBoard (inclusive) appear only once on each row. This method must be called after checking the values' range.
        Returns:
        true if the row constraint is respected; false otherwise

      • checkInitialCols

        private boolean checkInitialCols()
        Check that numbers between 1 and the size of the SudokuBoard (inclusive) appear only once on each column. This method must be called after checking the values' range.
        Returns:
        true if the column constraint is respected; false otherwise

      • checkInitialBoxes

        private boolean checkInitialBoxes()
        Check that numbers between 1 and the size of the SudokuBoard (inclusive) appear only once on each box. This method must be called after checking the values' range.
        Returns:
        true if the box constraint is respected; false otherwise

      • checkInitialBoard

        public boolean checkInitialBoard()
        Check that this initial board respects the Sudoku rules.
        Returns:
        true if the board respects the rules of Sudoku; false otherwise

      • isNumValid

        public boolean isNumValid(int[] cell,
                 int num)
        Check if a number can go in a specified cell of the board and not break Sudoku's rules.
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell to be tested
        num - the number to be tested
        Returns:
        true if the number doesn't break any rule; false otherwise

      • importFromCSV

        public static SudokuBoard importFromCSV(java.lang.String inputFile)
                                 throws ImportException
        Static factory method returning an instance of class SudokuBoard, by loading a Sudoku from a CSV file. This method performs several checks to ensure the Sudoku provided is correct.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - the pathname of the CSV file where to read the Sudoku
        Returns:
        the loaded SudokuBoard, or null if a problem occured while trying to read the input CSV
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IOException exception occured (except FileNotFoundException)
        ImportException

      • writeToCSV

        public void writeToCSV(java.lang.String outputFile)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes this board to a CSV file.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - the pathname of the CSV file where to write the results
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IOException exception occured (except FileNotFoundException)
